name: CigarsBaseball
0:
”Alexa, open Cigars Baseball”
”Alexa, ask Cigars Baseball when is the next game”
”Alexa, ask Cigars Baseball who is leading the team in hitting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cigars baseball
des: The Atlanta Cigars are an amateur mens baseball team from Atlanta, Georgia. This skill allows fans and players to keep up to date on the latest news regarding the team including game results, upcoming schedule, and player stats. For example, you can ask questions like: "Ask Cigars Baseball, how did the Cigars do last game?", "Ask Cigars Baseball, when do the Cigars play next?", "Ask Cigars Baseball, who is leading the Cigars in batting?", "Ask Cigars Baseball, what is the Cigars record?".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
